locations.category: Truck Stop, Public Facility, Truck Stop

showerReviews.reviewText: I am a female passenger of a truck driver so showers being clean is a HUGE thing and this one was clean and huge and the water pressure is WOW! Definitely a great shower.

The 1 star is for the water pressure in the shower. So, came here to fuel and rest up. I had a flat and went by the shop. They said it would be 3-4 hours. No problem, I am staying the night anyway. 6 hours later, no call to come in. 3 guys ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stayed here several times while my x kept taking me to court for divorce.  They made it possible to tough it out financially during this struggle.  Shower facility was great, 5 star.  Enjoyed the TV room to relax while doing laundry.  Clo ‚Ä¶

Super quiet clean TA. Showered at 4 am no problems. Shower was amazing. Lady at the register was so nice and friendly.  Coffee was yummy. Will put on my list of places to park for the night when in the area.

‚Ä¶ and those cardboard stand up merchandisers. If you are desperate for a place to go to the bathroom, it is perfectly fine. The bathrooms are generally pretty clean. The showers are very nice, roomy and most have been recently redone. ‚Ä¶

Attention truckers...BEST shower I have come across in a long time. And that includes my own at home! Water pressure like its falling straight off the cliffs of Niagara Falls! Very clean and shower staff were fun and upbeat. Definitely ‚Ä¶
Way to go TA. Maybe you should use some of your reserved parking money to pay employees to clean your $15 showers. ‚Ä¶
15$ for a shower is ridiculous. Parking lot good other than the high cost shower it's not bad but these truck stops needs to stop ripping us off. We are not millionaires.

Worst truck stop I‚Äôve been to in a long time cashier was rude and after spending 15$ for a shower and buying 17$ worth of items from the store then I asked for a bag for my items she in returns says rudely it‚Äôs 10 cents for a bag. I laughed ‚Ä¶
Only has subway & popeyes.  Can't find a parking spot after 5 pm.  $15 for a shower if you don't have points or buy fuel.
The promise for a hot shower and great water pressure is true ü•∫ tysm!! ‚Ä¶

While waiting to use the shower and repairs to my truck, the store manager Bill Richards, sees me waiting a long time, calling me a vagrant.  I was going to complain to the manager until I learned this jerk was the manager

Visited 12/12/24-12/13/24 Truckers: for a truck stop in the Northeast this TA nailed it. Parking is easy, plenty of spots throughout the night when I was there always a spot available. Showers are some of the best, clean, hot, water ‚Ä¶

One of my favorite TA's. I've been coming here for years and have not been disappointed as of yet! The staff is friendly and helpful and this TA has always been clean and tidy. Inside and out. Including the parking area. Love coming here! There's also a grocery store and an awesome diner within walking distance.

the bathrooms are dirty, unattended and no toilet tissue, been here for two days it has not changed. the food court staff are more interested intheir phones than helping customers, pizza was old and hard, prices very high, service is ‚Ä¶
Five stars, they have starbucks, laundry, showers, very nice
This place was amazing! So many amenities, very nice workers, very clean and inviting! Would definitely recommend for people like trucking drivers or travellers!

Great place for a traveling stop. They have showers, bathrooms, a convenient store, Pizza Hut, Popeyes, and plenty of parking spaces. They also have the Amazon pick-up lockers. Gas prices are comparable to other highway pit stops. Facilities looked cleaned.

This is one of the best good looking/cleaner travel plaza that i seen in a very long time.Very well supplied with stuff you need to keep you going,plenty of parking spaces and great showers aling with friendly staff,all ee need now is to ‚Ä¶

Easy access from I 95 . Not many pumps about 6 Clean restroom and they have a Popeyes , Pizza Hut ant Starbucks inside the store ! Thanks a lot
God bless

If you need some rest, this is the nice place to stop and take rest. You can have some quick bite and coffee. It has big and spacious sitting area. Restrooms are very clean here. Recommended for everyone.
Clean environment! Not overpriced. There is a McDonald‚Äôs Auntie Annie‚Äôs Carvel and a convenience store inside.
Very clean, easy on off Route 95. Fast food restaurants located within.

Very clean, bathrooms are well kept, enough pumps. Tesla service stations. Clean parking lot. Well kept grass as well

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ truck driver, I LOVE this store. All of my cousin's greet you as soon as you step into the store with a smile on their faces. The Shower crew does a "DAMN GOOD "Job. The showers are" ALWAYS "clean. The Food is ALWAYS fresh.ALL my cousin' ‚Ä¶

Excellent Pilot, spacious parking, clean showers, bright and clean retail space and absolutely terrible lazy staff who don't care at all about their work and the drivers who come there. I arrived in the evening at 6 pm and took a queue for ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 15 min parking, 15 min parking , 15 min parking .... How can any driver be  able to take a shower or restroom, buy some food or something and enjoy it??? Oo ‚Ä¶

Super clean showers 10/10 cleanest truck stop shower I've ever seen throughout the states I visited. But the line sucks lol. 20-30 in queue. Decent parking space size. But since it's close to NYC parking is still tough, but you have a ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ If it's full, after stopping here and fueling and or using the facilities, shower etc, there's a service area with more parking barely two minutes north on 95. Go there.

I always use Pilot, but I definitely won't go back to this one. I filled up and waited for over an hour and a half for a shower. There's simply no place to park the truck and wait, and the employee keeps throwing us out like I'm a dog. I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The locks on SEVERAL of the showers are broken. When I explained the issue, the cashier lady was very nice and refunded me and gave me a different shower, only to find out that the next one was the same way. However, when the manager went ‚Ä¶
The shower had good water pressure.  It doesn't get hot, just warm. We wanted to order a whole BBQ chicken pizza but they were out of chicken

‚Ä¶ . Wendy‚Äôs food was freshly made here also.  Being a trucker had to utilize the shower and was fresh clean towels and shower pod.  I imagine it‚Äôs difficult to sustain such high standards in a busy location but they got it figured out.  See ‚Ä¶

Medium sized pilot, clean showers, lots of diesel, friendly fast staff. Shower was smaller than most but turnover was really quick, had me worried that it would be gross, was really happy to see it was not!

showerReviews.reviewText: On August 31st the bathrooms were closed for cleaning. The staff refused to open one of the shower rooms so people would be able to use the bathroom. Every TA in the country opens one or 2 of the shower rooms for people to use the bathroom. ‚Ä¶

It was ok for the most part Shower and rest rooms was clean. Didn't have to wait very long for shower. Also, I was able to park in a reserve spot. They wont allow you to double park & rest neither. Their Guys come out periodically and check ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ days. To park is $25. The showers are disgusting, hair plastered to the wall, along with toothpaste that has been splattered out of others' mouths. Toilet sorta looked wiped down on the seat, but that's it, needs a good cleaning. The shower ‚Ä¶

We have choices of truckstop's. I fuel mostly TA's & Petro. Spend over $500 in fuel and are given a shower credit. 25% of parking  lot is free. Rest is paid parking. Why can't we use a shower credit for parking? $500 spent you're given 100 ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ I try to take shower but no free parking; just park beside the truck making easy access to everyone. The security guard came and shouted at me, we are here for your business

Associate tasha
I needed help from her for a shower coz
The didn‚Äôt work for me , she questioned me for a verification until she told me to bring my ID after bringing my ID she some how still refused to help purchase my shower

Ultra 1 points rarely work and when they do it requires you to get 60 gallons of fuel now to get a shower. Which is very difficult to do when the right side pump is not working and the clerk will not comp you a shower despite the broken ‚Ä¶

$25 per night to park in a lot that is filthy and smells terrible.  $18 for a shower that you need to wear shoes in so you don't catch something.  Very rude employees that act like doing their job is a huge inconvenience.  This place is low ‚Ä¶

Stopped to get a shower. I‚Äôm not a trucker so I can‚Äôt speak of any other services. I only used one shower so I can‚Äôt speak of the others, but mine was clean and stocked with towels and soap. There are 10 showers so I had no wait. The store ‚Ä¶

No star, I try to take shower but no free parking; just park beside the truck making easy access to everyone. The security guard came and shouted at me, we are here for your business, mannerless and so cheap people hired by this TA who even ‚Ä¶

Ok so you mean to tell me it snowed yesterday,  29degrees today and the shower barely has Luke warm water?? This is the type of things that are unacceptable.  There's no way it's this cold outside and it seems they are trying to save money ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ RESTROOMS ARE SO FILTHY, YOU'LL WANT TO HAVE A SHOWER AFTER YOU USE THEM ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ he just stands there looking at me with a displeased face. I left a phone number for taking a shower, he said he would call within 40 minutes, 1.5 hours had passed, he still did not call. I have no desire to come here again. I have never ‚Ä¶

bad service the shower is never available the employees have a bad attitude

Few years back I was homeless living in my car with my dog. Came here to shower and get some food after driving for grubhub all day. Nice people then but the showers had dirty vents. Just stopped in today for some food. Parking is always ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ bathrooms they're not focusing on doing so and the bathrooms you need very serious attention was looking forward to taking a shower here the other night but due to the fact that the bathrooms don't look in good condition as far as being ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ major credit cards including EBT, SNAP benefits also known as SAGA and/or food stamps!‚Ä¶I'm pretty sure this is one of those places You can take a shower too! The bathrooms are large. They have great deals on food and discounts on gas for ‚Ä¶

Today I have been here since morning trying to take shower every time I go they tell me one hour like this 5 times before we just make payment give cellphone number today he and she they didn‚Äôt make appointment for shower

‚Ä¶ Food ok. When you pumping diesel need to pump one side at the time. First driver side and then without removing gun you have to  pump satellite side. Shower ok. Parking $15 per day. Even if you just parked, someone will knock in your door. ‚Ä¶
Makes truckers pay $15 for parking, make couples take separate showers, at $14 a shower they shouldn't be dictating anything, no food. Just a mess..
Friendly people, a variety of food, clean bathrooms. Truckers have their own bathrooms as well with a shower room. Big parking lot but gets full quickly.

Hard to get shower dude that works 2nd shift is lazy and waits till all showers are used before cleanin and you can reserve shower and pay for it up front... place is very nice its the help that sux ...
Morning shift sucks come in at 4:30am to get shower and get told can't get one to 7am cause it has to be clean for shift change guess no one wants to work

This is my favorite stop for gas {which has very competitive prices or lower} and my travel snacks that are sometimes a little high, when I'm going on my box truck route. There are showers and rooms but I'm not sure the rooms are available. ‚Ä¶

I was told the 15$ for parking was good even if i left. Got back, no spots available, the different peson said the day shift kid was wrong. Wouldnt give me a refund. I basically threw 15$ out the window. Never going to any of these pride stops again. The bathrooms are filthy, the lady at subway makes a messy sandwich‚Ä¶.. never again

Expired food in the warming unit, women's restroom was filthy, no toilet paper in ANY of the stalls except the handicapped stall (and that roll was just sat on top of the dispenser), and the female cashier (5:30 am Wednesday) was very rude. ‚Ä¶
Extremely friendly staff. The store was very clean and organized. Plenty of options including hot food
Parking is $15 a night. Good food choices. They have showers and even laundry. And it's clean.
11.12.2022 Semi truck parking $15 a day. Lots of food available inside. Cleen restroom.
I‚Äôve gotten several shower doors from CT shower and bath and they‚Äôve all been great. One door had a bit of an unexpected delay but with the way things are these days it‚Äôs to be expected.

We had a major kitchen renovation (walls torn down, everything to the studs) completed through CT shower and bath. We spoke with a number of designers/contractors in the area, we felt that Steve and Judy at CT Shower and Bath came up with ‚Ä¶

Creation and installation of a custom glass shower door.  Very well run organization.  Steven who I dealt with directly was extremely knowledgeable and professional.  Dan and Shawn who installed were awesome -- extremely personable and very ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ are delightful to work with. After my first call to inquire about a custom shower door, I told my dad (a local contractor) that I was going to hire them just based on how nice and helpful the owner is. The team was communicative and prompt ‚Ä¶

CT Shower & Bath installed the shower door in our newly remodeled bathroom. It is absolutely beautiful and we could not be happier. Bailey was a pleasure to work with and is very sweet, professional and knowledgeable about the products. Fro ‚Ä¶

I am I home improvement contractor and I send all my clients to Connecticut shower the five or six jobs They've done for me at all turned out very well, service is great the girls doing the ordering know their stuff in the insulation thanks ‚Ä¶

Working with owner Steve Vendetta to design & select a custom vanity and a frameless shower door was a pleasure. His experience and knowledge coupled with exceptional insight to our preferences were valuable to our bathroom remodel success. ‚Ä¶

Clean store clean restrooms. Little gym room inside.
Massage chairs. And a lot of stuff.
‚Ä¶ The showers tanked the score here. I was going to be a 4 star review but I had to take off two. ‚Ä¶

When you‚Äôre a paying customer and you have to pay out off pocket for fuel, maintenance, etc., you would like to have a clean shower. These showers really need to be updated or, at the very least, a deep cleaning with new towels. I left ‚Ä¶
Shower was open and night staff I didn't ask for his name but he was really nice and friendly. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Stated 0 minute wait time for shower, wasted a credit because I spent 20 minutes waiting just to leave and forget about it. No good food, just a Popeyes, fried processed trash, just what us truckers need. Employee cleaning the shower ‚Ä¶

One of the staff members here always acts very rude, like he doesn't want to be at work. This time Simply ask for a shower using my rewards points with my phone number and was treated very rutly to get the shower.

Easy large lot, clean store/showers, 3 pair washers/dryers, friendly staff, (shower cleaner is very diligent and thorough).  Also, 2 great restaurants within 1 block - I really enjoyed this stop.  Melton
